Package bt.data

Interface ChunkVerifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultChunkVerifier

    public interface ChunkVerifier
    Implements data verification strategy.
    Since:
    1.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean verify​(ChunkDescriptor chunk)
      Conducts verification of the provided chunk.
      boolean verify​(List<ChunkDescriptor> chunks, Bitfield bitfield)
      Conducts verification of the provided list of chunks and updates bitfield with the results.
      boolean verifyIfPresent​(ChunkDescriptor chunk)  

    • Method Detail

      • verify

        boolean verify​(List<ChunkDescriptor> chunks,
               Bitfield bitfield)
        Conducts verification of the provided list of chunks and updates bitfield with the results.
        Parameters:
        chunks - List of chunks
        bitfield - Bitfield
        Returns:
        true if all chunks have been verified successfully (meaning that all data is present and correct)
        Since:
        1.2

      • verify

        boolean verify​(ChunkDescriptor chunk)
        Conducts verification of the provided chunk.
        Parameters:
        chunk - Chunk
        Returns:
        true if the chunk has been verified successfully (meaning that all data is present and correct)
        Since:
        1.2

        Since:
        1.9
